website_summaries.verdict: This regulation-size ball is known for its dunkable, grippy texture. It's better for indoors than outdoors, though.
pros: Suitable for use indoors and outdoors
Foam-backed design improves the feel and grip of the ball
cons: It smooths and loses its pebbling quickly with outdoor use

customer_reviews.title: If you're a real hooper you will know this ball is not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I've tried various balls out throughout my life: Evolution balls (best for indoor), Wave balls, Spalding replica balls, the list goes on. For $30 you should be receiving a fairly high end ball (Evolution balls can sometime be found for $45). I've had $20 balls from Walmart that have had better grip indoors and outdoors. The very first thing I noticed about this ball is how it picks up dust super easily -- I found the ball feeling almost like it was slipping out of my hands on every shot because of the amount of debris/dust that sticks. I'd say either buy a Wave (same/cheaper) or pay a few bucks more and just go for the Evo.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Take my son’s word for it!
customer_reviews.text: My son thought he lost this ball a few days ago. He was so upset. He said it was the best ball he’s ever had. He’s had it since Christmas and said it had been his favorite basketball (he’s had many!) because it hadn’t lost any of its grip yet which impressed him compared to other balls. Luckily we found the ball and he has it back but I will definitely purchase this again when the time comes. I trust my basketball loving son’s opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Denise P

customer_reviews.title: One of the better deals in indoor/outdoor basketballs.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an outdoor basketball for casual use. After does some research this ball was one of the top. It feels good in my hands which was my top requirement. Good deal and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, lasts forever!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best basketballs under $50 you can buy. I lied, it IS the best one you can buy. Been using some version of this ball for the last 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Pray4Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Authentic NBA Basketball feel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for playing on outdoor courts. It feels like an authentic indoor NBA basketball. I've compared with other outdoor balls at Walmart and this one by far was the BEST quality. Although it is about $10 more than the cheaper brands. BUT you get what you pay for and the quality exceeds the extra amount you invest.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent A.

customer_reviews.title: ... replacement for my old indoor/outdoor ball which had become pretty worn down and lost most of its grip--or so ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for my old indoor/outdoor ball which had become pretty worn down and lost most of its grip--or so I thought...until I got this one. Initially I thought that it just needed to be broken in a little but after a month of daily play I can say that this ball just doesn't want to grip. There is something just sort of...off about it--the material it's made out of, the way it bounces, etc. Similar to other negative reviews on here, mine is consistently in need of air and by now I've pretty much relegated this one to my trunk and gone back to old faithful.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Really recommend people to buy this ball and  great indoor not bad outdoor ball
customer_reviews.text: A great basketball with soft and squishy feeling. It has a nice texture color (black,gold). Not real leather composite. It can be used outside but, rough surface can damage the ball instantly. Dust can stick on it very easily and the ball isn’t that grippy so suggest to put little bit of water in your hand and dry a little bit to get a better grip. Nice color , good looking, ok bouncing. Good feeling when shooting. It is a really nice ball and giving 4 stars because of how they deliver the ball and negative parts of it.
customer_reviews.author: Yongmi Y.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews outside of Amazon and some of the ones here, this was supposed to be the best outdoor basketball. I go to the courts early in the morning to shoot around for exercise and I use the ball weekly for about a hour. In two months, it has lost a lot of its grip, I constantly have to wash the ball because it sticks to all dirt and dust. It's also heavier when compared to other basketballs I've tried. If you're a serious baller, I would look elsewhere. This Summer, I'll try another ball out in hopes it performs better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Poor grip
customer_reviews.text: My player puts up at least 500 shots per day out in the driveway, so you can imagine how exciting a new ball is. Actually did research and this came up very high-quality. My son gave it back to me after a day and said, “I’m sorry, Mom, but this ball has really no grip at all. Would you please return it?”
customer_reviews.author: Dusting My Iron

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Purchase  - Excellent Outdoor Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase for this basketball. The first one was used outdoors year around and lasted around 2.5 years. The first purchase is still usable however the surface has become warn and smooth and loosing grip which is to be expected. Overall this ball is the correct size, the grooves (seams) are not overly dominant like other outdoor balls, and it has an excellent tack and feel without offering too much grip. Even without use in storage for several weeks the ball seems to maintain excellent PSI.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Basketball
customer_reviews.text: I like this ball a lot. I've been using it for a few weeks now. It comes inflated, but you may need to put more air in it for optimal bounce. No big deal. The grip on the ball is great initially, but it wears off real quick. Like one use quick. But it still feels nice. I've been using it on a well paved outdoor court. I haven't had any issues with loss of air thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan1117

customer_reviews.title: Poorly quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this basketball because of the great reviews. The first one I received would not bounce right. My friends and I would dribble the ball straight down and it would go off to a completely different direction coming back up like it was lopsided which wasn’t the case. Ordered a second one and had the same issue... The quality of the black lines along the ball is horrible. The lines aren’t flush and are poorly made. I believe they are the culprit of the bad bounce. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: eric magana

customer_reviews.title: No bounce. Avoid this ball and pay more for a better one.
customer_reviews.text: I only write reviews when I feel like I have to warn others. Avoid this ball if you can. Pro: Ball leather quality is decent, good grip Con: Barely there “bounce”, For some strange reason the basketball I get just don’t bounce as high as my friends basketballs. This is not the first time too. Second time this happen while purchasing basketballs from amazon. Their basketball just feel like knock offs, you have to use all your wrist strength to bounce the ball high enough to do a cross over. I body build in the side and I have no problem benching 180+lbs. I don’t think the reason is I’m not dribbling it hard enough.
customer_reviews.author: Yong Ning Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Evo for outdoor use during this quarantine but it wasn't holding up at all. I thought I'd give this ball a try since it's made as an indoor/outdoor ball and it definitely holds up well. The grip is great, but it took some time breaking it in. It's VERY stiff when you first take it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: November'sVeryOwn

customer_reviews.title: raised air input makes dribbling unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ball in color and feel, but the air input/nipple is clearly raised a full 1/8" around the needle input, this is a disaster for reliable dribbling. I am convinced the online marketplace are seconds and rejects, would be easy to see and feel this raised area in a physical retail store; and likely rejected by the retail mgr to avoid returns.
customer_reviews.author: William G Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Glue is not strong enough for limited driveway usage
customer_reviews.text: The ball came promptly in the mail and so we blew it up. Bounced okay, but sounds weird vs a normal basketball should sound. After about 2 weeks or so, we noticed the skin started to come off the creases. A very poor glue job? A poor glue used? Not really sure. Normally, I have used a Wilson basketball. I actually just thew my two away I have used for the past 25 years. Yes, 25 years and this new Spalding lasted 2-3 weeks with issues showing. Not sure if I got a dud or if this is the actual quality. Consider this when purchasing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: David Henrickson

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware; quality on this ball dropped significantly. Size is also smaller than official.
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this same ball regularly for a while now. This last one feels like a knockoff. Maybe it is a different manufacturer or the same one decided to lower the quality. Made of plastic that provides no grip, and the size is also slightly smaller than official. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: burak

customer_reviews.title: The Best Basketball I've Ever Owned. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basketball to replace a $5 basketball that starting bulging within just a month's worth of use on an outdoor court. This one is better in every way. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KennyNashville

customer_reviews.title: No damage to box but ball had a hole
customer_reviews.text: Looked like it was ready to use but had a hole somewhere as it would not bounce, was not able to stay inflated. Wish I would have returned it but considered it a loss. My grandson was very disappointed because he also received an outdoor hoop for his birthday and then the ball wouldn’t work. Probably too late for refund. My fault for not acting sooner. 1 star for sad birthday boy though.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Brons

customer_reviews.title: Ball can't bounce if it can't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Correct me if I'm wrong, but balls are supposed to bounce. This ball doesn't hold air. Company wanted to open a case # , take pictures, explain what happened to my purchase. Seems they just want me to go away, so I will. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Booka

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Piece of trash. For one month it was good. After that, the ball starts losing air after 10 minutes of playing. No use. Even my 5-kid’s mini basket ball holds better.
customer_reviews.author: S. Woo

customer_reviews.title: THE only basketball for playing outside
customer_reviews.text: If you play outdoor basketball this is THE ball you need to have. Real leather balls are really expensive and probably not the best to be playing on concrete. The cheaper balls have that horrible plastic feel to them. They also last a good amount of time. I've been buying this style for years and really I wouldn't play with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: joel wing

customer_reviews.title: It's a basketball...
customer_reviews.text: It came as described, it is round and bounces... Seriously though, it works as designed and we have been using it for our outside basketball games.
customer_reviews.author: Owen H.

customer_reviews.title: I am highly dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this ball, it felt smooth, and made with high quality products. I started using it and I didn’t like the feel of it, and I was shooting very poorly. I didn’t think much of it though, but on the second day I started using the ball, and it started to peel. Needless to say I will not be getting this ball again.
customer_reviews.author: Cass Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Great ball but..
customer_reviews.text: Great Ball but it's slightly heavy. Grip is fantastic, but collects lots of dirt. Material seems to be very durable. Came completely inflated. I would not recommend for people who actually play competitive ball. Just spend a bit more, and buy an Evolution.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Best balls on the block!
customer_reviews.text: See ball, bounce ball, play ball with ball. See kid happy with new balls... they love it so much it keeps getting stolen so this is like the 3rd one I bought because his friends love it so much they keep borrowing his balls!!! Order more than one, as someone might try and steal your balls too. It’s just that great
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Serrano-Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Best Outdoor Basketball I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best Outdoor Basketball I've ever used. I used to buy the NBA Street Spalding basketball, but I after using this one I switched. The material is far superior than other Outdoor basketballs. I burn through the grip on basketballs very fast because I use them almost everyday. This one lasts the longest and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Eee Myla

customer_reviews.title: Bounces like a brick
customer_reviews.text: Terrible ball. No matter how much air, it has little bounce. Nice grip but hard to drive to the basket due to lack of control with bounce. May be a defect but not worth the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: n8isgr8

customer_reviews.title: Not a $30 Ball
customer_reviews.text: Some of the seams are uneven and the ball is not quite round. The embossed areas for branding are very smooth and difficult to handle if they come up in your hand when shooting or dribbling. I have had $20 balls superior to this one. Pretty disappointing for a $30 ball.
customer_reviews.author: HHelixx

customer_reviews.title: Good when new / got slippery pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: Great when I got it but it's really slippery only after 3 months of play on outdoor asphalt surface. I don't know if any other balls can maintain some form of stickiness on such a dusty surface but I was hoping this ball would do it since it's rated as outdoor and costs double the cheap balls.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Ball
customer_reviews.text: It's a little heavier than expected but its necessary for outdoor balls. Given Covid and lack of access to hoops, I finally got a hoop and this paired well with it! Great grip which is awesome for a more dusty environment in the outdoor setting.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Chang

customer_reviews.title: The ball constantly goes flat.... I ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball constantly goes flat....I pumped it up with air and played basketball for maybe 20 minutes and the air was already out of it. Every time I play it is flat and requires air. Defective ball.
customer_reviews.author: Dacanivalwannab4

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality. Lasted less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: The ball can not hold its air for more than a day. If I leave it for 2 days, I need to re-pump it. I has been gradually worse to the point where its unusable. It was also delivered a week after Amazon's expected delivery date. In addition, the item is cheaper on the maker's website.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Dribbling thru the pandemic
customer_reviews.text: Nice ball. Gonna last a long time. Still not all that easy to get it in the hoop! I guess I should have asked for instructions!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: This ball is a bit too slippery right out of the box. Once again Amazon is selling me items without original boxes for some reason. Hopefully this ball will break in as I plan to use it outdoors. I only want it to get some exercise playing by myself so I will keep it. However, if I was going to be playing pick up games with this, I wouldn't use this ball.
customer_reviews.author: monet878

customer_reviews.title: No grip =(
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews I read rating this ball top outdoor seem unreal.. Right out of the box the grip was slippery. I got smaller hands for being 6'3 and just hard to get good handles and shot is off with slippery grip.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Working On My Jumper...
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this basketball. I use it indoors at the gym only, even though I could use it outdoors...
customer_reviews.author: AJ Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great grip!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great basketball for pros or beginners because it has great grip which is essential to any player during any game. I have trained with this basketball and it has helped me with its great grip, feel, and bounciness considering the material used to manufacture this product. I recommend this product for anyone interested in basketball or as a gift for a friend or family.
customer_reviews.author: Ediblepizza's Mom

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: When I received the basketball, there was a crack along the black line, I felt it would become more obvious before I played for a long time, so I thought I could change it, and when I changed it again, I was very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Fangyi Li

customer_reviews.title: Nice feeling out of the box, but picks up a lot of dust
customer_reviews.text: definitely has a nice bounce out of the box, feels a little lighter than a lot of balls i am used to. Dislike the stitching since they seem to protrude a bit. Would definitely like to try other balls, but for the price you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Vinzo

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control issues
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, has a visible raised center ridge under the cover that runs the entire circumference of the ball and this ridge runs the opposite direction of the "seam" of the ball. For example if the "seams" and the logo are aligned east to west this raised center ridge runs north and south. maybe I just got a bad one. probably going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Silvertone

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is really not an outdoor ball and I actually thought it was leather when I purchased it and it isn’t it’s rubber that of course was my fault but it’s really not an outdoor ball at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Only use this for indoor
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new ball to play with at the park and I saw that the reviews on this product was promising. Not a lot of people reviewed the ball being used for outside play, so I thought I had to share. After maybe around a month and a half of running 5’s and other pick up games at the park, I noticed that the outer layer of the ball started to peel off. The durability of the ball drops a butt ton If you use it outside but i am sure it will last longer inside.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Serrano

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best basketball I've ever used considering how much it costs. I've used it for 6 months now and it is still very reliable and I'm still able to palm it as easily as I did on day 1. I would recommend people to store it indoors like what I did as that will help preserve its lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball
customer_reviews.text: I’m far from being any good at basketball, but I like the feel of this ball, it’s got decent grip, bounces appropriately... it just doesn’t go in the basket much when I throw it. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Squeeze70707

customer_reviews.title: COUNTRY COURT SPECIAL
customer_reviews.text: Living out in the sticks we needed a more sturdy ball that wouldn’t explode on the occasion rock or stick from driveway. And sometimes the dog tries to bite it too!
customer_reviews.author: EXCLUSIVE SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor basketball. Have had for about 1 month. Leather is good...ball bounces good. I use on driveway so it seems quality. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Guarino

customer_reviews.title: The ball BROKE, when I tried to fill it up.
customer_reviews.text: I got the ball out, it was kinda flat. I put it back in the box, after 4 days I decided to play with it but I needed to fill it up. When I tried to fill it, soon as I entered the needle in the air hole, the seal broke and the air hole went inside the ball and all the air came out. Instantly broke, didn’t have time to return it then forgot about it so now Basically money down the toilet. Never buying this company’s ball again. Buy a Wilson they’re way more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maitray

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last outdoors.  Maybe indoors it’s good?
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews, the composite cover does not last playing on an outdoor surface. After having this for a year, the cover is shredded.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball
customer_reviews.text: It did a great job of bouncing and everyone had fun playing basketball for our family gathering. It looks like it will get lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: roxyh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This basketball lives up to the quality that I have come to expect from Spalding. It seems very durable and would be good for both indoor and outdoor use. It’s also a great value for someone looking for a quality basketball without wanting to pay for a more expensive ball.
customer_reviews.author: dascollege

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids are having a great time with it. Glad we purchased a good one this time. It is well made and should last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Collard

customer_reviews.title: Good ball and good value.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. An excellent outdoor ball that is a good value. Have used it for a few weeks and it looks like it will hold up. Feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: HoiPolloi

customer_reviews.title: PEELING
customer_reviews.text: I ONLY USE IT FOR LIKE 4DAYS IN MY BACKYARD AND IT STARTED TO PEEL!..ITS A GOOD BALL BUT IT JUST STARTED PEELING OFF IDK WHY..
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Was suppose to get it inflated, came half inflated, that should've been my tell something is wrong- there is an air leak, I have to inflate it everytime I use it. And yeah, got it with the Spalding airbumb, which broke in first use... so, here you go.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud Abu Hazeem

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Seemed cheap. Did not dribble well. Felt off. Like a cheap replica of a basketball. Wouldn’t have bought it if I had seen it in person.
customer_reviews.author: random thought

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grip for the price
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the price. It shipped fully inflated. Best grip of all the balls used at my nearby court. It does wear somewhat quickly, but that's the pitfall of the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Spaulding basketballs are the way to go. This is easy to handle and was given as a gift. It has lasted through some tough gridiron battles!
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good bounce
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good basketball, has good bounce and has lasted so far. The price is fair too. Recommend if you want a good quality basketball
customer_reviews.author: Noel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Came in almost totally flat - stuffed in a plain cardboard box. Completely unusable. Returning .
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Ball didnt come inflated and also wont hold air in for more than a day, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The basketball was exactly what I expected. Quality was very good, great grip, no blemishes or defects. I did order through the Amazon fulfillment center after reading reviews suggesting quality issues through other sources. I am using the ball regularly outdoors on concrete. Still early but the grip and finish are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: MAD

customer_reviews.title: No bounce
customer_reviews.text: It came fully pumped, but for some reason it lacked the bounce it should have had, I'd have to put extra effort into bouncing the ball to get the ball back up. :/
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Super Ball!
customer_reviews.text: Outdoor and indoor just like it says - it’s a great ball. I bought one for a friend and before I gifted him another friend saw it and went crazy over it. I wound up buying 3 all total - love it - got one for myself😀
customer_reviews.author: Clarence E Beverly III

customer_reviews.title: Indoor/Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is having so much fun playing with her basketball. I’ve thoroughly checked this product over and it’s very good for both indoor and outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Just got
customer_reviews.text: Tested it out the day we got it (aka yesterday). We have a dirt driveway and it still has a good dribble bounce where some balls in the past haven't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The ball is good and performs better than others in this price range. I would recommend spending the extra cash on a nicer ball though. I will keep this for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: ball never stayed inflated
customer_reviews.text: Ball was supposed to arrive inflated for use - but was only partially inflated. I inflated it, but every morning it was deflated again. Would not hold air. After a few days I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. Sticks to his hand! Lol! Basket shots greatly umproved! Old ball very worn out!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah F

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson was very excited to receive a new basketball for Christmas very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Only used it exactly 3 times (for an hour each), and the ball already started falling apart. See photos. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: xblam

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided after first use
customer_reviews.text: Played basketball on outdoor court for about 2 hrs. came back next day and the ball was noticeably lopsided. I am looking into a different ball soon, we use someone else's ball, unless mine is the only one available.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Milam

customer_reviews.title: By the others guys b-ball.
customer_reviews.text: Air valve garbage design can inflate !!!! . The ball size is small and not as advertised as official nba rock bc I can palm it . More like a lady ball size .
customer_reviews.author: ony velez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ball
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our church youth group. They were easy to inflate and have a good "gripping" surface. Durable to a lot of indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Paulz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money if you want an outside ball.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice quality ball, but it is not meant for outside. There really isn’t a grip compared to other balls. I only use for outside and usually daily. I would recommend spending a little more and get “the rock” ball.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Berg

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Synthetic leather is peeling off the ball in less than 2 months with minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeTime

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband and he loves it. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Corey L

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson a year ago. He practices on his cement driveway and this ball holds up well. Very good quality. Would recommemd
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn C.

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: The ball has started peeling after 2 months of minimal use. It also doesn’t bounce as well as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christel Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Basketball!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great making it very durable. I bought this ball to just shoot around during quarantine very impressed by the grip and bounce. Initially I thought it was a bit pricey but you are getting your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve bought for my son. He wore the heck out It and needed a new one. This was a great choice for my teenage son.
customer_reviews.author: vanagnos

customer_reviews.title: Honest Seller
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast, Superb & Very Reliable... Great Transaction & Honest Seller! Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Elgert Jr

customer_reviews.title: mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The ball was very basic -- not worth the price. Does not keep pressure
customer_reviews.author: GDB

customer_reviews.title: You like it!
customer_reviews.text: In the quest for value when purchasing a basketball, look no further! It’s reasonably priced, aesthetically pleasing, incredibly symmetrical, pleasantly hued and a truly valuable addition to one’s athletic menagerie.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, decent price
customer_reviews.text: Been using spalding for the past decade, probably wont use anything else
customer_reviews.author: Andy C.

customer_reviews.title: Below average durability
customer_reviews.text: Decent basketball, the cover began to peel after a couple months. Disappointing durability
customer_reviews.author: DAVIDGUERRERO27

customer_reviews.title: so I felt like I shouldn't return it
customer_reviews.text: You have to keep filling it with air every time you use it. It's a really hassle. My son needed it for a camp we used it 3 day...so I felt like I shouldn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Children like it very much and say that the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lin

customer_reviews.title: Dont forget to buy the air pump
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor and indoor ball is really good. It is better indoor much but it can be played outdoor as well. I have only played indoor because of the COVID situation. It is a perfect gift if you are trying to give it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Beeps Peace

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems to (very slowly) leak air and doesn't have a great grip
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: Need to add air before use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this basketball, even though there were cheaper ones, just because it came inflated and ready to use. It came inflated but not enough to bounce more than a foot off the ground. Very disappointed as I don’t have a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Wyman

customer_reviews.title: nice looking basketball
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift looks just a basketball feels like one and I am sure it will give many years of great service a great pick
customer_reviews.author: Dearl D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The ball has a nice feel when playing in doors and outdoors
customer_reviews.text: The ball has a nice feel when playing in doors and outdoors. We've had it a month and it still has good texture for grip on the ball. We will need to see how it holds up over a few months. So far, it seems like a good ball for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems with this ball , I use indoor not outdoor so
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my 10 year old. He likes ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 10 year old. He likes it, and his coach usually picks his ball to use for the team scrimmages now! Ball has help up well after a month or so of use so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tbone4217

customer_reviews.title: There is something in the newly bought basketball
customer_reviews.text: There is something in the basketball, as long as it shakes it will make a noise
customer_reviews.author: mingming1991

customer_reviews.title: Very official
customer_reviews.text: My big bro has a few “regulation” size basketballs and this is the only one he likes.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Shumate

customer_reviews.title: decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. I hope it lasts longer than our last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Griggs

customer_reviews.title: ITEM IS NOT AS DESCRIBED.
customer_reviews.text: Received product that was NOT regulation size. Its a fluke, no big deal, guy in warehouse grabbed the wrong ball. Received replacement. The SAME undersized ball arrives which is NOT regulation NBA size. Description of item is blatant lie. At least the look of the ball matches the photo. That's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Cover is very tough. Don't know if that's a good thing or bad. Kinda seems to hinder the bounce but it still works. Has good grip
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: Spalding NBA Zi/O Indoor-Outdoor 29.5" Basketball
product_meta.description: Ready to splash through nets and trip up defenders. The Spalding NBA Zi/O Excel Indoor-Outdoor Basketball is foam-backed for a solid bounce, both at the gym and in the driveway. The Zi/O Tournament composite cover is soft and slightly tacky, making the ball easy to palm. Shipped Inflated and game ready.
feature_bullets: Official NBA size and weight: Size 7, 29.5 inch
Foam backed design for excellent feel
Designed for indoor and outdoor play
